pos_mean_info_list.mean: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的

word_group.brief_definition: 具体地说；确切地说；更具体一点

bilingual.target: 具体地说，它控制着太阳黑子周期。

bilingual.source: Or, more specifically, about whether to copy it.
bilingual.target: 或者, 更具体地说, 重新思考是否要照搬.

bilingual.source: I want you to know specifically what I am doing.
bilingual.target: 我让你具体地知道我正在作些什么事.

bilingual.source: Specifically, let's look at the damage claim case.
bilingual.target: 具体地说，我们要研究一下损害索赔案例。

bilingual.source: In each case, name the "disaster" quite specifically.
bilingual.target: 在每件事上，都相当具体地指出“灾难”之名称。

bilingual.source: More specifically, we can do some very specific things.
bilingual.target: 更具体地，我们可以做些非常具体的事。

bilingual.source: Specifically, the clarity and projection of the altissimo range.
bilingual.target: 具体地说，可以影响高音区发音的清晰度和穿透力吗？

bilingual.source: So, let's consider specifically where these glitches are taking place.
bilingual.target: 那么让我们来具体地想一想，这些小偏差发生在哪里。

bilingual.source: So, we're going to focus more specifically on a couple of things.
bilingual.target: 所以，我们将更具体地关注几件事。

bilingual.source: Second, more specifically to write their own performance in the preparation period.
bilingual.target: 第二，要比较具体地写自己在预备期间的表现。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if they're not being targeted specifically...
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然袭击的主要目标不是平民。

yingyinNormal.en: We do give them the concept of dreams. Specifically nightmares.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的确赋予了他们梦境概念，尤其是恶梦。

yingyinNormal.en: What's in the spray specifically? The primary ingredient is Bacitracin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，这个喷雾的主要成分是什么？喷雾的主要成分是"杆菌肽"。

yingyinNormal.en: The gardeners have planted white roses when I specifically asked for red.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些蠢货园丁居然种的白玫瑰，我特意交代过要红的。

yingyinNormal.en: Currently, you're being paid under a grant to specifically research string theory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目前大学给你的研究基金是只能做特定领域研究的。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is that? Sim City. More specifically, the Sim City I designed, Sheldonopolis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是哪里呢？模拟城市[一款游戏]，更确切地说，是我设计的模拟城市，谢尔顿奥波利斯。

yingyinNormal.en: Mrs. Gopnik, who, specifically, did you hire to help you with this adoption? Which firm?
yingyinNormal.zh: 高普尼克夫人，具体来说，你雇佣了谁帮你安排领养？哪家律所？

yingyinNormal.en: Right. And if it's anything other than you specifically not being decapitated by a doorway, I win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错。而如果是除了保护你免于被门梁斩首的其他用途的话，就算我赢。

yingyinNormal.en: I specifically asked you about whether Ford was going to be a problem, and you assured me he wasn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我特地问过你福特会不会成为麻烦，你跟我保证他不会。

yingyinNormal.en: I need the subspace frequencies of Starfleet's border protection grids, specifically those surrounding Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要受星际舰队保护的所有星球的坐标，特别是地球周围的那些。

yingyinNormal.en: Specifically, if this will is invalid, then the identically witnessed Lockhart/Gardner retainer agreement is invalid, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特别地，如果这份遗嘱是无效的，那么受到相同见证的洛&加律所的聘用协议也是无效的。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking specifically of the gentleman over there moving his lips as he enjoys the latest exploits of Betty and Veronica.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想到了那边那位念念有词欣赏最新《贝蒂和维罗妮卡》的先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm working on time-dependent backgrounds in string theory, specifically quantum field theory in "d-dimensional" de Sitter space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在研究弦理论的时间依赖性，尤其是量子场论在德西特时空d维空间中的应用。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm given to understand that there's an entire city in Nevada designed specifically to help people like Howard forget their problems.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我发现内华达州有一大堆特别设计的城市能帮霍华德这类人忘却他们的烦恼。

yingyinNormal.en: I came to New York specifically to do this play. My play. And now, because of you, I have to go to Hanukkah dinner at my parents' house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跑到纽约来就是为了这部戏。是我的戏，可现在就因为你我不得不去我爸妈家参加光明节晚餐。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, that's right. And, so far, each of your fellow defendants has specifically denied being part of that process. Now, I'm going to ask you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，没错。到现在为止，其他几位被告都否认自己曾参与这一过程。现在，我要问你。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, hold on. Page 18 of the surrogacy contract, Tara, you specifically agreed to terminate if there were substantial signs of birth defects.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，冷静点，代孕合同第18页，塔拉你特别同意了若有足够证据证明孩子先天缺陷则终止妊娠。

yingyinNormal.en: In the meantime, I'd like to go over some proposed changes to the roommate agreement specifically to address Penny's annoying personal habits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与此同时，我要对室友协议进行一些修订，特别要提出关于佩妮十分烦人的个人习惯。

yingyinNormal.en: Great. Now, this may look like a Tic Ta, but it is really a powerful medication specifically designed to cure your illness as well as freshen your breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，这可能看似是薄荷糖，但它其实药效强大，还特别设计成能治疗疾病的同时，帮你清新口气。

yingyinNormal.en: So, clearly, there's, you know, some messed-up stuff going on here. How messed up? I don't know. What specifically? I don't know that, either. Any questions?
yingyinNormal.zh: 很明显，那个他们充满了危险的气息，有多危险？我不知道，怎么个危险法？我也不知道，还有疑问吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>specifically</highlight> to provide city dwellers with spaces for leisure where they could experience "a refreshing air."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是专门为城市居民提供休闲空间，让他们可以体验“清新的空气”。

examination_example.sentence: The European Union Framework funding programs have long had a category <highlight>specifically</highlight> targeted at social scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欧盟框架资助项目长期以来有一个专门针对社会科学家的类别。

adj. 极度的；极大的；极强的；极好的；绝妙的；了不起的；巨大的；异乎寻常的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in distinction from others, for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: However, the new study appears to be the first to <highlight>specifically</highlight> look at the relationship between optimism and longevity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这项新的研究似乎是第一个专门研究乐观主义和长寿之间关系的研究。

examination_example.sentence: Technology broadly and automation <highlight>specifically</highlight> are dramatically reshaping the way we work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 广泛的技术，特别是自动化，正在极大地重塑着我们的工作方式。

examination_example.sentence: The market for products designed <highlight>specifically</highlight> for older adults could reach $30 billion by next year, and startups (初创公司) want in on the action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到明年，专为老年人设计的产品的市场规模将达到300亿美元，创业公司也想参与进来。

sense_info_list.en: in a detailed and exact way

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in distinction from others; for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: What's needed now is a marketplace platform <highlight>specifically</highlight> designed to bring freelancers and clients together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在需要的是一个专门用于将自由职业者和客户聚集起来的市场平台。

examination_example.sentence: Poverty has been interchangeable with people of color—<highlight>specifically</highlight> black women and black mothers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贫穷已经可以和有色人种互通有无了，特别是黑人妇女和黑人母亲。

examination_example.sentence: To that end, they have been studying how other species deal with low gravity, <highlight>specifically</highlight> focusing on mice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为此，他们一直在研究其他物种如何应对低重力，特别是老鼠。

sense_info_list.en: in a detailed and exact way

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 特意; 具体地; 明确地

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Specifically</highlight>, the study found that men who ate alone more than twice a week had a greater risk of developing high blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 具体来说，研究发现，一周单独吃饭超过两次的男性患高血压的风险更大。
